snippet: Evan Fournier scored 24 points and Aaron Gordon had 19 points and 14 rebounds as the Orlando Magic snapped an eight-game losing streak with a 119-114 win over the Boston Celtics....
lead_paragraph: Evan Fournier scored 24 points and Aaron Gordon had 19 points and 14 rebounds as the Orlando Magic snapped an eight-game losing streak with a 119-114 win over the Boston Celtics.

headline.main: Fournier Scores 24, Gordon 22 as Magic Rally to Beat Celtics
headline.print_headline: Fournier Scores 24, Gordon 22 as Magic Rally to Beat Celtics
